title: Initiate hauberk

It provides a small prayer bonus that matches the Monk's robe top, while retaining the defensive bonuses of a Mithril platebody, and is commonly used during slayer tasks that require the use of protection prayers, as the armour reduces the drain of prayer points.

Item ID5575

The initiate hauberk is a piece of Temple knight armour that requires 20 Defence, 10 Prayer, and completion of the Recruitment Drive quest to equip. It provides a small prayer bonus that matches the Monk's robe top, while retaining the defensive bonuses of a Mithril platebody, and is commonly used during slayer tasks that require the use of protection prayers, as the armour reduces the drain of prayer points.

If lost, another hauberk can be bought for 10,000 coins, but is usually much cheaper to buy from the Grand Exchange.

Wearing the initiate hauberk does NOT interfere with Ava's Devices.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The hauberk's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

20 September 2006
(update)

The item was renamed from "Initiate platemail" to "Initiate hauberk".

17 October 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated with the release of Wanted!
